articles.title: Metropolis Editorial System: How the Automated Newsroom Works
articles.deck: A sample article shipped with the repository to validate rendering, layout and feed wiring.
articles.author: AI Desk
articles.body_html:
Architecture

Metropolis combines topic selection, source retrieval, structured drafting and editorial cleanup in a single automated pipeline. Each role can run on a separate inference node, allowing the system to continue publishing even if one model route degrades.

Quality Controls

The pipeline removes reasoning artifacts, enforces publication-safe copy, and normalizes style. Legacy feed entries can be rewritten automatically to keep voice and formatting consistent across the homepage.

Operations

Background jobs manage generation cadence, health checks and optional repository sync. The frontend reads from this JSON feed and renders article cards and detail pages without requiring a dynamic backend.
